forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with light rain possible. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
